description: Unify same-version releases, add System Design review tooling and visual diff mode, and publish artifacts/controls for faster release review.

changes.description: group same-version changelog entries and add push timestamps/details

details.summary_simple: Release history now groups pushes under one version and shows per-change timestamps and expandable details.
details.user_visible_outcome: Researchers can read grouped version updates with clearer per-change context.
details.risk_notes: Low to medium: grouped actions across merged entries should be validated.

changes.description: add pre-push system design artifact generator and workflow config

details.summary_simple: Added generator/config to produce System Design snapshot and diff artifacts for release review.
details.user_visible_outcome: Push workflow can now generate architecture review artifacts.
details.risk_notes: Low: mapping patterns may need occasional updates.

changes.description: add system design diff view and release workflow controls

details.summary_simple: Added before/after visual diff mode in System Design plus release control toggles in Changelog.
details.user_visible_outcome: Researchers can compare before/after architecture visually and control auto-release marking in UI.
details.risk_notes: Low to medium: file-to-node mapping should be reviewed when architecture changes.

changes.description: publish system design artifacts and manifest generator updates

details.summary_simple: Artifacts are now published to public paths with a manifest so UI links always resolve.
details.user_visible_outcome: Snapshot/diff links in Changelog and System Design load directly in the app.
details.risk_notes: Low: ensure generated artifact files are kept in sync with workflow runs.
